name: Kobatochan Reader Mode
description: Removes unnecessary material, removes side columns, removes the banner image, centers the chapter content, banner and search. Makes for a more pleasant reading experience. Github repository. Pairs well with my kobatochan accesskey naviagtion script. --- If you're feeling generous or like my stuff, feel free to donate. I'd appreciate it. Ko-fi. Paypal. Liberapay.
